title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: New revelations about your family open your eyes. You might be tempted to chastise yourself for not spotting troublesome issues sooner. Use any lingering strong feelings to uproot what remains in the dark. But be patient since haste and harsh words only delay unearthing the truth. Uncovering stories from the past frequently raises a myriad of emotions that require tender care. However, these fresh insights also foreshadow budding possibilities for creating more peace and understanding with folks you hold dear. Rumi wrote, Love is the bridge between you and everything. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
